subtitle: A delicious crunchy stuffing to enhance any plain roast chicken

method.text: Heat oil in pan and cook onion and mushrooms for 2 min. Allow to cool.

Transfer to a mixing bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix together well. Use to loosely stuff neck end of chicken and roast according to pack instructions. (If stuffing a turkey, you will need to double the quantity.)
Shape remainder of stuffing into balls.
Halfway through cooking chicken, arrange stuffing balls around chicken. If desired, place extra mushrooms around roast chicken for last 10 min.

title: Mushroom and chestnut stuffed roast chicken.
